change_log:
Bug: Fixed issue with paragraph question type
 Bug: Fixed issue with qmn_register_my_templates hook
 Bug: Fixed issue with %CATEGORY_POINTS_X% template variable
 Bug: Fixed issue with question numbers in email
 Bug: Fixed issue with elementor popup
 Bug: Issue fixed with touch devices
 Feature: Added option to set default number of answers
 Feature: Added option to search questions from question bank
 Enhancement: Made UI improvements in polar question

blog_post.title: Super Avenger Quiz: Which Avenger Are You? Find Out in 1 minute!
blog_post.excerpt: Avengers is one of the most cherished and precious gifts that MCU (Marvel Comic Universe) has provided us. Thank you, Stan Lee. But have you wondered which Avenger are you? Don’t worry, we do not leave you in question, take an Avenger Quiz to find out which of the 6 (core members) Avengers are you! […]

blog_post.title: Creating a Snowflake Test Quiz in 4 easy steps!
blog_post.excerpt: Snowflake test is the talk the hour, did you take one yet? No? Well, that’s okay, because Quiz and Survey Master has made one just for you! In this blog, you could not only take this super famous snowflake test online quiz but you will also get to know all about this test! The Quiz […]

popular_products.name: Google Sheet Connector
popular_products.description: Sync your surveys with Google Sheets.

popular_products.name: Paypal and Stripe Payment Integration
popular_products.description: Add payment wall for quiz and surveys using this addon. Integrate Paypal or Stripe and start receiving payments.

popular_products.name: Simple Popups
popular_products.description: Have you ever wanted to have your quiz or survey inside of a popup? With this easy to use addon, now you can!

popular_products.name: Google Analytics Tracking
popular_products.description: Track your quiz and survey submissions in Google Analytics.

popular_products.name: Reporting & Analysis
popular_products.description: Analyze your results by visualizing the data in a variety of different graphs, filter the data, and export the data.

popular_products.name: Zapier Integration
popular_products.description: With Zapier Integration, Quiz And Survey Master can sends results to over 700 different websites and services using Zapier.

popular_products.name: Export Results
popular_products.description: This add-on gives you the ability to export your quiz results as a CSV file which can be imported into spreadsheet programs such as Excel and Google Sheets.

popular_products.name: User Dashboard
popular_products.description: This add-on gives you the ability to set up a page where users can review their results from all the quizzes they have taken.

popular_products.name: MailPoet Integration
popular_products.description: Grow your list of subscribers in MailPoet by using this addon to add users who take your quizzes and surveys!

on_sale_products.name: Google Sheet Connector
on_sale_products.description: Sync your surveys with Google Sheets.
